text: Olowo Elewuokun was a traditional ruler of Owo Kingdom, Ondo state, southwestern Nigeria. He succeeded his father, Olowo Ajaka and was succeeded by his son, Olowo Aragunwaye. ==References== Category:Yoruba monarchs Category:Nigerian traditional rulers Category:People from Owo Category:Olagbegi family
title: Olowo Elewuokun
